kohoma wunath e් siduwima ekka mahinda ha madhya gana kalin liyannata patangena manga nawathunu post ekak yali athata hasuwiya.
ema gowi mahatha ada dina siyalu rasayana gowithanen miduna sarthaka hela gowiyeki.
nathahoth buddhapadesa meya dharmaya , meya winaya , meya shasthru shasanaya kiya asawal wehera wasana sangha maha sthiwaraya unwahanselagen asana ladi.
mama poddak dagenama thamayi aawe..“

me haraha sadharanathwaya, yukthiya, samanathmathawaya ha samaya mulika themawan karagath sha්ri lankawak wenuwen kapawena e sadaha sinhala janasamajaye sanskruthika, adhyathmika pariwarthanayaka awashyathawaya gana awadharanaya karamin e wenuwen mulikawa wehesena sinhala kalakaruwan, madhyakaruwan, shastha්ragnyayin saha samaja ka්riyadharayan pirisak ekata gonuwima siduwiya.

* siyaluma sanskruthika urumayan haniyata path wannata nodi aaraksha kara ganima sandaha idiripath wana deshiya aayathana saha aagamika siddhasthanawalata awashya aadhara sapayime wadasatahanak nopamawa aarambha karami.

aththa anith pituwala balanna thiyenne lipi deka thunayi..
ohuta saha ohuge pawulata ella wela thiyena dushana, wancha, paharaganim, paharadimwalata sambandha nadu wibhaga akarmanya karamin durwala karamin katayuthu karanna ohuta ooni.

me swabhawaya janathawage sith sathan thulin aath kara owunta rajaye prakashana kerehi wishwasayak athi wana paridden kriyakala yuthu wima athyawashya we.
renuka, laki samanga kiwe raswimakadi hamuwi katha bas karamin sitiyadiya.“minihath api wagema thamayi ban.

mema sammukha sakachchawa 1996 di prakashayata path sithijaya wara sagarawe kalapayakin uputa ganna laddaki.1996 wana wita podujana eksath peramunu aanduwa balayata pathwa wasara dekak gathawa thibuni.ema aanduwa wisin 1995 hatagath udghoshanayakadi kamkaruweku wedithaba mara damima ewakata wishala aandolanayak janitha kaleya.ejapaye wiwrutha aarthika gaman margayen kadi wen wana bawata prathignya di balayata pamini chandrika bandaranayaka libaral dhanawadaye udyogimath sathkarikawaka bawata me wanawita pathwi sitiyaya.
